message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $115. Can you meet me there?
I understand you're interested in the product, but I'm not quite ready to meet you at 115. How about we compromise at 125?
I appreciate the compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. How about we meet at $120?
I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, but I'm still a bit below my minimum price. How about we meet at 125 again?
